author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Chng Heng Tee (alias Cheng Kim Tee) and Another v Estate & Trust Agencies (1927) Ltd (Ho Hong Bee Christina (executrix of the estate of Koh Tek Heng, deceased), intervener) and Another Matter
